txt.en:
'The Orcs have laid waste to our crofts, and barely any of our crops still stand. 

'We will soon find ourselves starving if we do not harvest anything and leave it to the Orcs to finish what they have begun.

'Go to the crofts to the west of here. When I fled, I saw some of the wheat still standing amid the destruction. Harvest as much as you can - it will be our last chance to do so.'
'This was a risky move, but if we were to claim any of our remaining crops, we had to harvest them now or risk losing everything to Orcs.\n\n'Thank you for your aid.'
Adalgifu of Walstow is concerned that time is running short to finish this season's harvest and wants you to collect as much wheat as you can, as untrained as you are.
As you slice the wheat, it splits into several smaller bundles
Wheat can be found in the fields just outside Walstow.
Having collected the wheat, you should return it to Winsig.\n\nWinsig can be found inside the mead-hall of Walstow.
